name: AnionGapLabTestCapillary
title: Anion Gap Lab Test Capillary
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains lab test codes commonly used for a capillary Anion Gap lab test.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who had a lab test for Anion Gap based on a specimen source  of Capillary blood. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to 'Laboratory Test, Result' or 'Laboratory Test, Order' datatype.),(Inclusion Criteria: Anion Gap lab test using the specimen source of Capillary.),(Exclusion Criteria: Anion Gap test using the specimen source outside of Capillary blood and any other system source.)
